title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8002.1 - Parole release interview
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8002.1 - Parole release interview

State Regulations
(a) Each
inmate shall be scheduled for a parole release inter view at least one month
prior to the expiration of the minimum period of imprisonment or parole
eligibility date as fixed by the Department of Corrections and Community

Supervision, or upon such reconsideration date as previously set by the Board
of Parole ("Board"). (b) The parole
release interview shall be conducted by a pane l of at least two members of the

Board. (c) The panel conducting the
parole release interview shall discuss with the inmate each applicable factor
set forth in section
8002.2
of this Part, excluding
confidential information. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 9

8002.1

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 30, effective
7/30/2014

Adopted

New

York State Register September 27, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 39, eff. 9/27/2017

Procedures for the conduct of the work of the state board
of parole, Executive Law ยง 259-i. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
